text: A Separation (, meaning The Separation of Nader from Simin) is a 2011 Iranian French Australian drama movie directed by Asghar Farhadi and starring Leila Hatami, Peyman Moaadi, Sarina Farhadi, Ali-Asghar Shahbazi, Sareh Bayat, Shahab Hosseini, Babak Karimi. It was nominated for 2 Oscars and won an Academy Award in 2012. ==Other websites== * * Category:2011 drama movies Category:Iranian movies Category:French drama movies Category:Australian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Asghar Farhadi
title: A Separation
